title: DEMOTION SHIELD EXPIRING
body:
Hi
 just recently got this on my diamond 4 ranked badge on my profile. What does this mean??? THANKS!!

replies.body:
Means if you lose at 0LP you no longer have demotion protection.

>After being promoted into a new division or tier, you’ll gain the effects of a demotion ‘shield,’ which prevents you from dropping. This is to keep you from winning a series, losing a few games and then immediately dropping back to where you were. The shield lasts for 3 games after advancing a division, and 10 games after advancing a tier (3 games for Master tier).

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h3q2
Has it already expired? If i lose now, will i get demoted to plat 1? It says it is expiring so will i be allowed to lose a few more games before demoting? Thanks.

"Expiring" would indicate that it has not yet expired, but will soon. If you remember which game got you promoted to D4, then count 10 games from there and that's how many games you are protected for.

thats strange, becoz i have played alot more than 10 games., so it should have expired already.  ive searched up some forums and it seems this message comes when you have lost too many games at 0 lp, and have very low MMR and therefore risk demotion to the next tier. Could you verify this? I have had a bad llose streak and have lost 6 games in a row at 0 lp, so I'm really scared of getting demoted to platinum, because i want to keep diamond rewards :((

It could be that it's 10 games at 0 LP? That sounds like too much but I'm not sure sorry. Player Support might be able to shed some more light but the only info I have is what's in that FAQ that I linked.
